actions.name: GetAntiPattern
actions.description: Grants permission to get details of each anti pattern that collector should look at in a customer's environment

actions.name: GetApplicationComponentDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to get details of an application

actions.name: GetApplicationComponentStrategies
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of all recommended strategies and tools for an application running in a server

actions.name: GetAssessment
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve status of an on-going assessment

actions.name: GetImportFileTask
actions.description: Grants permission to get details of a specific import task

actions.name: GetLatestAssessmentId
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the latest assessment id

actions.name: GetMessage
actions.description: Grants permission to the collector to receive information from the service

actions.name: GetPortfolioPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve customer migration/Modernization preferences

actions.name: GetPortfolioSummary
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve overall summary (number-of servers to rehost etc as well as overall number of anti patterns)

actions.name: GetRecommendationReportDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve detailed information about a recommendation report

actions.name: GetServerDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to get info about a specific server

actions.name: GetServerStrategies
actions.description: Grants permission to get recommended strategies and tools for a specific server

actions.name: ListAntiPatterns
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of all anti patterns that collector should look for in a customer's environment

actions.name: ListApplicationComponents
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of all applications running on servers on customer's servers

actions.name: ListCollectors
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of all collectors installed by the customer

actions.name: ListImportFileTask
actions.description: Grants permission to get list of all imports performed by the customer

actions.name: ListJarArtifacts
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of binaries that collector should assess

actions.name: ListServers
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of all servers in a customer's environment

actions.name: PutPortfolioPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to save customer's Migration/Modernization preferences

actions.name: RegisterCollector
actions.description: Grants permission to register the collector to receive an ID and to start receiving messages from the service

actions.name: SendMessage
actions.description: Grants permission to the collector to send information to the service

actions.name: StartAssessment
actions.description: Grants permission to start assessment in a customer's environment (collect data from all servers and provide recommendations)

actions.name: StartImportFileTask
actions.description: Grants permission to start importing data from a file provided by customer

actions.name: StartRecommendationReportGeneration
actions.description: Grants permission to start generating a recommendation report

actions.name: StopAssessment
actions.description: Grants permission to stop an on-going assessment

actions.name: UpdateApplicationComponentConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update details for an application

actions.name: UpdateCollectorConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to the collector to send configuration information to the service

actions.name: UpdateServerConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update info on a server along with the recommended strategy
